name: Turla PNG Dropper Service
description: This method detects malicious services mentioned in Turla PNG dropper report by NCC Group in November 2018
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:WerFaultSvc)`
